_instructions: About section content - tell your professional story and showcase key metrics.
paragraphs: Product management professional with 5+ years of experience delivering user-focused, scalable solutions across finance and technology domains. Experienced in defining product vision, prioritizing roadmaps, and leading cross-functional teams to execute high-impact initiatives.

Currently pursuing my M.S. in Engineering Management at California State University, Northridge, I bring strong ability to align business goals with technical feasibility, optimize processes, and drive continuous product improvement through data-informed decisions. As a Certified Scrum Master with a solid technical background, I bridge the gap between product strategy and engineering execution.
